metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9704 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: Vixie Cron before the 3.0pl1-133 Debian package allows local users to cause a denial of service (daemon crash) via a large crontab file because the calloc return value is not checked.

criterions.comment: cron package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0pl1-134ubuntu1').
